translations: v．挥霍，浪费：大量地、过分地给予或花费（金钱、时间、关注等）。
· She lavished money on her children.
她在孩子身上挥霍金钱。

sentences.sentence: He lavished praise on his opponents.
sentences.translation: 他对他的对手大加赞赏。

sentences.sentence: Zi-gong said, "Undoubtedly it was Heaven that lavished upon him such great sageness and versatility."
sentences.translation: 子贡说：“毫无疑问，上天使他成为圣人，又使他多才多艺。”

sentences.sentence: Food of all kinds he loved and lavished.
sentences.translation: 不管什么样的食物，雷诺特都珍爱有加。
